moves.name: Wide Guard
moves.description: The user and its allies are protected from wide-ranging attacks for one turn. If used in succession, its chance of failing rises.

moves.name: Low Kick
moves.description: A powerful low kick that makes the target fall over. It inflicts greater damage on heavier targets.

moves.name: Leer
moves.description: The opposing team gains an intimidating leer with sharp eyes. The opposing team's Defense stats are reduced.

moves.name: Focus Energy
moves.description: The user takes a deep breath and focuses so that critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: Karate Chop
moves.description: The target is attacked with a sharp chop. Critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: Focus Energy
moves.description: The user takes a deep breath and focuses so that critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: Karate Chop
moves.description: The target is attacked with a sharp chop. Critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: Low Sweep
moves.description: The user attacks the target's legs swiftly, reducing the target's Speed stat.

moves.name: Foresight
moves.description: Enables a Ghost-type target to be hit by Normal- and Fighting-type attacks. It also enables an evasive target to be hit.

moves.name: Seismic Toss
moves.description: The target is thrown using the power of gravity. It inflicts damage equal to the user's level.

moves.name: Revenge
moves.description: An attack move that inflicts double the damage if the user has been hurt by the opponent in the same turn.

moves.name: Vital Throw
moves.description: The user attacks last. In return, this throw move is guaranteed not to miss.

moves.name: Submission
moves.description: The user grabs the target and recklessly dives for the ground. It also hurts the user slightly.

moves.name: Wake-Up Slap
moves.description: This attack inflicts big damage on a sleeping target. It also wakes the target up, however.

moves.name: Cross Chop
moves.description: The user delivers a double chop with its forearms crossed. Critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: Scary Face
moves.description: The user frightens the target with a scary face to harshly reduce its Speed stat.

moves.name: Dynamic Punch
moves.description: The user punches the target with full, concentrated power. It confuses the target if it hits.
